text: The New York Hall of Science is a science and technology museum in New York City. It has over 400 exhibits on biology, chemistry and physics. The museum occupies one of the only remaining structures of the 1964 New York World's Fair in Flushing Meadow-Corona Park in the borough of Queens in New York City. Category:Museums in New York City Category:1964 establishments in New York (state) Category:Queens (New York City)
title: New York Hall of Science
